summary: Iteration 20 testing completed. All requested features verified: 1) window.confirm() removed from main pages (only legacy files retain them), 2) OrdiniFornitori page has compact UI (padding: 12px, fontSize: 11-12px), 3) POST /api/fatture-ricevute/aggiorna-metodi-pagamento endpoint works correctly, 4) Admin page has 'Aggiorna Metodi Pagamento' button in Manutenzione tab, 5) Dashboard and main pages load without errors.
critical_code_review_comments: OrdiniFornitori.jsx: Compact styles applied - container padding: 12px, card padding: 12px, button padding: 6px 12px, fontSize: 11-12px
ArchivioFattureRicevute.jsx: No window.confirm() calls found - UX improved with direct actions
Admin.jsx: 'Aggiorna Metodi Pagamento' button added with data-testid='btn-aggiorna-metodi-pagamento' in Manutenzione tab
fatture_ricevute.py: New endpoint POST /aggiorna-metodi-pagamento at line 2073 - updates invoice payment methods based on supplier defaults
Legacy files in _legacy folder still have window.confirm() but these are not actively used
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from iteration 20 verified working. Compact UI styles applied to OrdiniFornitori. window.confirm() removed from main pages. New endpoint /api/fatture-ricevute/aggiorna-metodi-pagamento works and returns proper response structure.

dashboard_loads.details: Dashboard 2026 loads correctly with all widgets (Bilancio Istantaneo, Imposte, Scadenze F24)

ordini_fornitori_compact_ui.details: Page loads with compact styles - padding: 12px, fontSize: 11-12px, reduced margins

aggiorna_metodi_pagamento_endpoint.details: POST /api/fatture-ricevute/aggiorna-metodi-pagamento returns success with proper response structure

admin_aggiorna_metodi_button.details: Button found in Admin > Manutenzione tab with data-testid='btn-aggiorna-metodi-pagamento'

window_confirm_removed.details: No window.confirm() in main pages (ArchivioFattureRicevute, OrdiniFornitori, Admin). Only legacy files retain them.

fatture_ricevute_tabs.details: Only 3 tabs present: Archivio, Riconcilia, Storico. Scadenze tab correctly removed.

no_console_errors.details: No error messages found on Dashboard, Ordini Fornitori, Admin, Fatture Ricevute pages
